lines.text: If I had to choose between spending a weekend with my family and being upside down in a barrel full of maggots, the maggots would win every time.
Relax Dad. Maybe he'll drop dead of a massive coronary like Aunt Edna's first husband.
If anything happens to her I'm holding you personally responsible.
You wanted her to leave just as much as I did.
I wanted her to move out, not become an episode of "Unsolved Mysteries".
